Swarm of Quippers.explanation: Both are swarms of aquatic beasts with piercing bite attacks and swarm mechanics.

Swarm of Bats.explanation: Both are swarms of small, mobile creatures capable of flight and engaging multiple foes.

Swarm of Poisonous Snakes.explanation: Both are swarms of agile, biting beasts that attack in numbers and can occupy the same space as others.
